<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Plentiful Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=6419) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 216 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=265)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6414)

</column>

---

You can prepare incredible numbers of [snares](/Traits.aspx?ID=809) each day out of simple ingredients. Double the number of prepared snares granted by Snarecrafter Dedication.
name: Plentiful Snares
